creator: gnovak@choicestream.com
text:
Specifying an absolute path to the csv file results in the following message 
being written to the jmeter.log file:

2005/12/01 16:28:28 ERROR - jmeter.config.CSVDataSet: Failed to read file: 
C:\qatests\test1\data-profAttrs.txt

Converting the path to be relative to the jmeter startup directory works around 
the issue.

This is by design with that version of JMeter.

However, the code has now been fixed to allow absolute paths. This will appear
in the 2.1.2 release (or you can try a nightly build).
creator: sebb@apache.org
